column3: Department of Naval Architecture, Ocean and Marine Engineering (NAOME)
column5: Marine engineering involves the systems and equipment on board marine vehicles including:designconstructioninstallationsupportThere’s a particular emphasis on propulsion and control systems.High efficiency and low environmental impact of marine engines are the key factors in assuring economical operation and environmental protection in maritime transportation. This has important implications for both economic success and environmental impact.The Department of Naval Architecture, Ocean & Marine Engineering (NAOME), a leading institution in Scotland, offers excellent teaching and research facilities in naval architecture, ocean and marine engineering, which expands your career opportunities in naval architecture, marine, offshore oil and gas industry.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
